title: The glory of typography - Matt Avery
content:
Hi there, I recently found this wonderful online portfolio of some works by Matt Avery. I guess everybody here should be enlighted, and possibly inspired, by his achievements.

[http://matthewavery.com/index.php?/projects/typographic-books/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019142509/http:/matthewavery.com/index.php?/projects/typographic-books/ "http://matthewavery.com/index.php?/projects/typographic-books/")
author: ncaleffi

comments.content: Thanks for posting that link, Nicola. Beautiful work.
